title: Please Help BugSplat
body:
I already sent a ticket but haven't gotten a response yet, i was wondering if anyone else can help me.
I been struggling to logon to league of legends and play a game because as soon as i logon i get a bugsplat, and am forced to restart my laptop and try again, i have reinstalled league of legends several times, if anyone knows how to fix this please let me know.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please provide more info as to when specifically you're receiving a bugsplat, is this happening when you attempt to load into a game or while attempting to log into your account?

* Do you have discord's overlay enabled? If so, please try disabling this **Discord > Settings > Overlay > Disable**
